What is a private server?


A private server allows you to experience Minecraft in the way it was intended. In a public server who knows if your house will still be there the next day.

Server Rules & Restrictions


To keep the community safe and civil there are couple rules to follow


  • Do not be disrespectful!
  • Definitely do not be racist, homophobic, sexist etc!
  • Do not grief.
  • Do not do harmful pranks, e.g fill their house with lava.
  • No hacking!
